Back to Johann Sebastian Bach

Johann Sebastian Bach

Pieces from the second Notebook for Anna Magdalena Bach, BWV Anh. 113–132

c. 1734 · BWV3 Suppl 1, pp. 638–639

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 15'

  • 1. Menuet in F major, BWV Anh. 113
  • 2. Menuet in G major, BWV Anh. 116
  • 3. Polonaise in F major, BWV Anh. 117a (first version)
  • 3. Polonaise in F major, BWV Anh. 117b (second version)
  • 4. Menuet in B-flat major, BWV Anh. 118
  • 5. Polonaise in G minor, BWV Anh. 119
  • 6. Menuet in A minor, BWV Anh. 120
  • 7. Menuet in C minor, BWV Anh. 121
  • 8. Musette in D major, BWV Anh. 126
  • 9. Marche in E-flat major, BWV Anh. 127
  • 10. Polonaise in D minor, BWV Anh. 128
  • 11. Menuet in D minor, BWV Anh. 132

The second notebook for Anna Magdalena Bach contains multiple works for keyboard. All those given on this page are possibly spurious. Those known to be spurious are omitted; these are the menuets in G major (BWV Anh. 114) and G minor (BWV Anh. 115) by Christian Petzold, the marche in D major (BWV Anh. 122), polonaise in G minor (BWV Anh. 123), marche in G major (BWV Anh. 124) and polonaise in G minor (BWV Anh. 125) by Carl Philipp Emanuel Bach (H 1/1–4), the solo in E-flat major (BWV Anh. 129) by Carl Philipp Emanuel Bach (mov. 1 of Wq 65/7; H 16), the polonaise in G major (BWV Anh. 130) by Johann Adolf Hasse, the piece in F major (BWV Anh. 131) by Johann Christian Bach, and the rondo in B-flat major (BWV Anh. 183) by François Couperin.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 4 · BA 5008-01 · Die Klavierbüchlein für Anna Magdalena Bach von 1722 und 1725 · ed. Georg van Dadelsen
  • Associated Board · The Anna Magdalena Bach Book of 1725 · ed. Richard Jones
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5164 · Klavierbüchlein für Anna Magdalena Bach / 1725 · ed. Georg van Dadelsen
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5242 · Klavierbüchlein für Anna Magdalena Bach / 1725 · ed. Georg van Dadelsen
  • Henle · HN 349 · Notenbüchlein für Anna Magdalena Bach · ed. Ernst-Günter Heinemann
  • Henle · HN 10 · Notenbüchlein für Anna Magdalena Bach · ed. Ernst-Günter Heinemann
  • Henle · HN 1349 · Notenbüchlein für Anna Magdalena Bach · ed. Ernst-Günter Heinemann
  • Peters · EP 11500 · Die Clavier-Büchlein für Anna Magdalena Bach / 1722 & 1725 · ed. Christoph Wolff
  • Peters · EP 11501 · Die Clavier-Büchlein für Anna Magdalena Bach / 1722 & 1725 · ed. Christoph Wolff
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50150 · Clavierbüchlein der Anna Magdalena Bach · ed. Naoyuki Taneda
